item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
2. Bundesliga Logo The 2. Bundesliga is the second division of professional football in Germany. It was implemented 11 years after the founding of the Fußball-Bundesliga as the new second division for professional football. The 2. Bundesliga is ranked below the Bundesliga and above the 3. Source
You can download the2 Bundesligalogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: 2 Bundesliga
item.description: The 2. Bundesliga is the second division of professional football in Germany. It was implemented 11 years after the founding of the Fußball-Bundesliga as the new second division for professional football. The 2. Bundesliga is ranked below the Bundesliga and above the 3. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 3. Liga Logo
The 3. Liga is a professional association football league and the third division in Germany. In the German football league system, it is positioned between the 2. Bundesliga and the fourth-tier Regionalliga. The modern 3. Liga was formed for the 2008–09 season, replacing the Regionalliga, which had previously served as the third-tier in the country. In Germany, the 3. Liga is also the highest division that a club’s reserve team can play in.
You can download the3 Ligalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: 3 Liga
item.description: The 3. Liga is a professional association football league and the third division in Germany. In the German football league system, it is positioned between the 2. Bundesliga and the fourth-tier Regionalliga. The modern 3. Liga was formed for the 2008–09 season, replacing the Regionalliga, which had previously served as the third-tier in the country. In Germany, the 3. Liga is also the highest division that a club’s reserve team can play in.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 A-11 Football Logo
The A-11 Football League was a proposed professional American football league that was announced in 2013 and originally planned on beginning play in 2014 but folded before taking the field. The A11FL planned on playing a spring and summer schedule using modified National Football League rules that allowed for the A-11 offense, a system which potentially allows “All 11” offensive players to be eligible receivers, thus creating a more wide-open game.
You can download theA-11logo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: A-11
item.description: The A-11 Football League was a proposed professional American football league that was announced in 2013 and originally planned on beginning play in 2014 but folded before taking the field. The A11FL planned on playing a spring and summer schedule using modified National Football League rules that allowed for the A-11 offense, a system which potentially allows “All 11” offensive players to be eligible receivers, thus creating a more wide-open game.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Alliance of American Football Logo
The Alliance of American Football was a professional American football league. The AAF consisted of eight centrally owned and operated teams in the southern and western United States, seven of which were located in metropolitan areas with at least one major professional sports franchise. Founded by Charlie Ebersol and Bill Polian in 2018, the AAF began play on February 9, 2019, six days after the National Football League’s Super Bowl LIII championship game.
You can download theAlliance of American Footballlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Alliance of American Football
item.description: The Alliance of American Football was a professional American football league. The AAF consisted of eight centrally owned and operated teams in the southern and western United States, seven of which were located in metropolitan areas with at least one major professional sports franchise. Founded by Charlie Ebersol and Bill Polian in 2018, the AAF began play on February 9, 2019, six days after the National Football League’s Super Bowl LIII championship game.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Andorran Football Federation Logo The Andorran Football Federation is the governing body of football in Andorra. It was founded on 1994 and joined as a member of FIFA and UEFA in 1996. It organizes the football league, Andorran First Division, the Andorran Cup and Andorran Supercup, and the Andorran national football team. It is based in Escaldes-Engordany. Source
You can download theFAFlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: FAF
item.description: The Andorran Football Federation is the governing body of football in Andorra. It was founded on 1994 and joined as a member of FIFA and UEFA in 1996. It organizes the football league, Andorran First Division, the Andorran Cup and Andorran Supercup, and the Andorran national football team. It is based in Escaldes-Engordany. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Bundesliga Logo The Bundesliga, sometimes referred to as the Fußball-Bundesliga or 1. Bundesliga, is a professional association football league in Germany. At the top of the German football league system, the Bundesliga is Germany’s primary football competition. Source
You can download theBundesligalogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
